author: Lounge
install_msg: Thanks for installing the IdentityTheft cog! Use [p]help IdentityTheft to see all commands.
name: IdentityTheft
short: Responds to 'I'm ...' with identity theft humor
description: Detects 'I'm ...' messages and responds with 'Hey Name!' if the user identifies themselves (by mention or text name), or humorous impersonation responses if they claim to be someone else.
end_user_data_statement: This cog stores user IDs in a blacklist for opting out of webhook impersonation.
